popover.title: Search
popover.description: Press the Enter key or click the search icon to submit your search.

popover.title: Search results
popover.description: The results of the search are displayed in this area. Each row describes a different variable that matches your search result.

popover.title: Add a genomic Filter
popover.description: Use the genomic filtering button to apply a filter using genomic information. Note* you can also search for genomic variables using the search bar.

popover.title: Add a filter
popover.description: To view available filters for a variable, click on the filter icon in the row of interest.

popover.title: Add numeric filter
popover.description: To add a numeric filter, enter the min and max values you want in the filter.

popover.title: Add numeric filter
popover.description: Click the plus icon to add the filter

popover.title: Filters added
popover.description: Any filters added will end up in the results sidebar.

popover.title: Add categorical filter
popover.description: You can continue to add filters.

popover.title: Add categorical filter
popover.description: To add a categorical filter, click on the options you want to include in the filter.

popover.title: Add categorical filter
popover.description: Click the plus icon to add the filter

popover.title: Added filters
popover.description: You can view, edit, or delete previously added filters from the result sidebar.

popover.title: Add a variable to export
popover.description: Add a variable to exported data by clicking the export icon on the variable of interest.

popover.title: Added exports
popover.description: You can view, or delete previously added variables for export from the result sidebar.

popover.title: Get help
popover.description: To learn more about these features, consult the documentation and use the information links throughout the site.
